thread.title: BRIEF-Streamwide H1 net profit swings to profit of 0.1 million euros
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Streamwide H1 net profit swings to profit of 0.1 million euros | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Streamwide H1 net profit swings to profit of 0.1 million euros
text:
Sept 21 Streamwide SA :
* H1 operating loss 0.3 million euros ($336,150.00) versus loss of 1.2 million euros year ago
* H1 net profit 0.1 million euros versus loss of 0.8 million euros year ago Source text: bit.ly/1MEJPmg Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8925 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom)
